articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - Britain reactivated emergency hospitals built at the start of the pandemic and shut primary schools in London on Friday to counter the rapid spread of a much more infectious varian… [+2473 chars]

articles.author: The Economist
articles.title: SARS-CoV-2 is following the evolutionary rule book - The Economist
articles.description: Its new variants are optimised for spreading
articles.content: NATURAL SELECTION is a powerful force. In circumstances that are still disputed, it took a bat coronavirus and adapted it to people instead. The result has spread around the globe. Now, in two indepe… [+7731 chars]
